column2: Josh Duggar arrested for Child Pornography
column5: Demonstrating that he has the morals necessary to be a Republican particularly a Republican representative from Florida Josh Duggar has been arrested for receiving and possessing materials depicting the sexual abuse of children. Famous? for his role in 19 and Counting and more famous for having allegations of abusing his sister and other girls of non legal age he faces first court appearances in July.www.nwaonline.com/...  Wow my first time to the rec list and I will be forever associated with this maggot. Thanks I guess.  Statement from the Duggar Family:  “We appreciate your continued prayers for our family at this time. The accusations brought against Joshua today are very serious. It is our prayer that the truth no matter what it is will come to light and that this will all be resolved in a timely manner. We love Josh and Anna and continue to pray for their family.” Jim Bob and Michelle Duggar
